mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON E.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON T.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN "POSITION" P ON E.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO WHERE E.COM_NO = #{comNo}

SELECT EMP_CODE ,D.DEPT_NM ,T.TEAM_NM ,EMP_LAST_NAME ,EMP_FIRST_NAME ,P.POSITION_NM ,EMP_EMAIL , DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUTHORITY_MEMBER WHERE EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND AUTHORITY_NO = 1), 0, 'N', 'Y' ) AS ATTENDANCE_YN , DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUTHORITY_MEMBER WHERE EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND AUTHORITY_NO = 2), 0, 'N', 'Y' ) AS FUNCTION_YN , DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUTHORITY_MEMBER WHERE EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND AUTHORITY_NO = 3), 0, 'N', 'Y' ) AS TEAM_BOARD_YN ,D.DEPT_NO ,EMP_NO ,EMP_ID ,E.COM_NO ,E.TEAM_NO ,P.POSITION_NO ,GENERAL_MANAGER FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN TEAM T ON E.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON T.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN "POSITION" P ON E.POSITION_NO = P.POSITION_NO WHERE E.COM_NO = #{comNo} ORDER BY DEPT_NO, TEAM_NO, POSITION_NO
